short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No need to search for Coupons & Deals. Get them right in your Browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to enhance and improve shopping experience  and provide the customer access to deals, promo codes,  and cashback reward offers  as they browse, compare deals and product offers right where they shop online.
